title: Java Major Version Migration Plan
description: Creates a detailed migration plan for upgrading Java projects from one major version to another, covering deprecated APIs, new features, and tooling updates.
template:
Create a comprehensive migration plan for {{project_name}} from Java {{current_version}} to Java {{target_version}}.

1. Scan codebase for deprecated API usage that will break in {{target_version}}
2. List removed APIs and suggest modern replacements
3. Identify new language features in {{target_version}} that could simplify existing code
4. Review third-party library compatibility
5. Update build tool configuration ({{build_tool}})
6. Outline JVM flag changes and performance considerations
7. Create testing strategy for validation
8. Estimate effort (hours) and risk level (1-10)
9. Provide step-by-step migration checklist

Build Tool: {{build_tool}}
Key frameworks: {{frameworks}}

Output as: Executive Summary | Breaking Changes | Modernization Opportunities | Migration Steps | Risk Mitigation

examples.output_outline: Migration plan showing removal of java.util.Date usage, switch to records, update to Spring Boot 3.x, module system adoption, toolchain configuration, 80-hour estimate, risk score 7/10
